title: Soredemo Yappari Kimi ga Suki
original_name: それでもやっぱりキミが好き
sinopse:
1. Ippo Mae wo Aruku Riyuu (The Reason I Take One Step Forward)
2. Soredemo Yappari Kimi ga Suki (But I Love You for all That)
3. Tic-Tack
4. Sekisetsu no Toki (When the Snow Accumulate
5. Centimeter Rhythm
6. Jikosaiten
7. Sangatsu no Tobira
8. Hakoniwa no Tokiwa
9. Kataomoi Nochi Renaichuu, Tokidoki Ue no Sora
